DOC.brief_title: The Effect Perioperative Lidocaine Intravenous Infusion Postoperative Recovery After Spine Surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : study use prospective , randomize , double-blinded , placebo-controlled clinical trial . Sixty patient schedule spine surgery randomly assign two group . Lidocaine group receive intravenous bolus injection lidocaine 1.5 mg/kg intubation , follow 2 mg/kg/h continuous infusion operation . Placebo group receive dosage saline time . Analgesic requirement monitor use patient-controlled Analgesia ( PCA protocol : demand dose 2 mg morphine , lockout 5 min , maximum dose 15 mg per hour ) . Forty-eight hour surgery , check morphine consumption two group . Quality recovery surgery assess use Q0R15 questionnaire .
